name: Tandoori Chicken (from an Indian Restaurant)
ingredients: 1/4 tsp ginger, garlic powder 1 tsp lemon juice
instructions: Cut chicken, skin and cut diagonal slices into the meat.
Combine remaining ingredients with the yogurt.
Pour mix over chicken and turn to coat all pieces.
Marinate in refrigerator at least 8 hours or overnight.
Roast chicken into oven 45 minutes or until done.
